exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables a, p, q.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H : reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b) a0, b0 : Term A n nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b0 p, q, r : list (Term A n) H1 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b0 q) Q H2 : divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a0 b0 H3 : eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a0 b0 nZb p q) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b) H0 : pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a0 p = s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a H4 : r = s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b Unable to unify "divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a0 b0" with "CombLinear (b :: Q) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a0 p)".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H : reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b) a0, b0 : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) H2 : reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q H3 : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a0 b0 H0 : pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a0 p = s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a H1 : pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b0 q = s2p A A0 eqA n ltM b Unable to unify "eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a0 b0" with "CombLinear (b :: Q) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a0 p)".
